text: Poselyayte ikh tam, gde vy sami poselilis' po vashemu dostatku: ne delayte im nepriyatnogo, chtoby utesnit' ikh. A yesli oni s noshey, to raskhoduyte na nikh, poka oni ne slozhat svoyey noshi. A yesli oni vykarmlivayut vam, to davayte im ikh platu i sgovarivaytes' mezhdu soboy s dostoinstvom. A yesli vy zatrudnites', to pust' kormit yego drugaya
